review: Did not even have it for five minutes and my mother was asking for her own.
author: Stephanie McCann

review: Seems to work pretty well so far.  The biggest problem I have with it is that you are unable to select directv as a provider with the history app.  All other devices directv is one of the providers that is available to sign in with.
author: user

review: It doesn't interface with our internet well. It has interuptions while watching a show and slow speeds.  My router is two rooms away so that could be some of the problem.
author: AJ

review: Honestly,  it was super easy to set up.  I love that it has Netflix and PBS apps.  BUT I wish HBO GO app.  If you can add more popular apps to download that would be great!  Other than that I'm a happy customer.  Love Amazon!
author: V. Lynch "Vicky"

review: Haven't even plugged it in yet and a little irked.  All advertisements, even the picture to the left don't show that you need to connect a power supply.  A little deceptive advertising.  Very Bogus.
author: John C. Keiler

review: It is better than Netflix by far.Thanks..easy to set up and got me lots of choices I didn't have.
author: Anne Swatzell

review: I am very impressed with its streaming speed and apps.
author: Felix I. Quiros

review: I will have to 're-program' my WiFi Extender for Fire Stick........would NOT log into my ATT Uverse WiFi!
author: A. J. Landry
